name: SSF3
title: Site-Specific Factor 3
subtitle: History of Asbestos Exposure
notes:
**Note 1:** The most common risk factor for malignant mesotheliomas is previous exposure to asbestos. The latency period between asbestos exposure and the development of mesothelioma is generally 20 years or more.

**Note 2:** Document any stated asbestos exposure based on documentation from medical record.
rows: Not applicable: Information not collected for this case

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
